content: **christmas santa ornament crochet pattern** adorable santa claus amigurumi crochet pattern in pdf format perfect for christmas ornaments tree decorations or festive hanging décor instant pdf download for your holiday crafting the crochet pattern is 7 pages long and written in english and us crochet terms the pattern contains plenty of progress photos to guide you along and is an easy skill level project **supplies** 3mm crochet hook dk weight yarn scissors sewing needle 5mm safety eyes toy stuffing **yarn** weight dk / light worsted/ #3 brand stylecraft squeeze me dk a champagne b white c red d black e yellow total 49 yards **gauge** 3mm hook 2″ x 2″ swatch = 10 row of 10 single_crochet **finished size** width 8cm x height 13cm **abbreviations us terms ** chain chain double_crochet double_crochet 2dc 2 double_crochet in 1 space increase magic_ring magic_ring r round / row single_crochet single_crochet 2sc 2 single_crochet in 1 space increase decrease single_crochet 2 together decrease slip_stitch slip_stitch st/sts stitch/stitches **skill level** easy **notes** a free online basic version of this crochet pattern is available at https //hookfully com/crochet-santa-ornament-free-pattern/
